data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Dosya Kapama Parametreleri Interface'
define root view entity ZI_NFT_DDL_T011 as select from znft_t_t011
left outer join I_AccountingDocumentTypeText as blart_tx on blart_tx.Language = $session.system_language
                                                        and blart_tx.AccountingDocumentType = znft_t_t011.blart
left outer join I_AccountingDocumentTypeText as blartts_tx on blartts_tx.Language = $session.system_language
                                                        and blartts_tx.AccountingDocumentType = znft_t_t011.blart_ts                                                        
{    
    key znft_t_t011.bukrs as Bukrs,
    znft_t_t011.blart as Blart,
    znft_t_t011.blart_ts as BlartTs,
    znft_t_t011.mwskz as Mwskz,
    znft_t_t011.zterm as Zterm,
    znft_t_t011.clrsh as Clrsh,
    
    blart_tx.AccountingDocumentTypeName as blart_tx,
    blartts_tx.AccountingDocumentTypeName as blartts_tx
}
